~ Codes for version 1.2.0 ~
By Skoolzout1


===========================================================================================
Again, i will not be explaining how to use any of the codes unless they are newly created
in this version of the game. instructions can be found in the above versions.
All codes WITH button activators are for gamepad only unless stated otherwise. Codes with no
activator work the same regardless of your controller.
 
Infinite Health
30000000 43AD1E30
10000000 50000000
31000000 FFFFFFF0
12100000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
30000000 42274980
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000388
13100000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
Pointers:
[0x43AD1E30] - 0x10 = Max Health
[0x42274980] + 0x388 = Current Health

Freeze a particular time
00020000 407CBB8C
XXXXXXXX 00000000
3f800000 = 12am
42980000 = 5am
43080000 = 9am
43340000 = 12pm
43800000 = 5pm
439E0000 = 9pm
 
Weather Modifier
00020000 407CDE1C
XXXXXXXX 00000000
01030002 = cloudy effect
03010002 = dark rainy
00010002 = sunny
07000007 = lightning Effects
05000007 = fog and snow
 
No Clouds
00020000 407CDDA8
00000000 00000000
 
Spawn Lightning Storm
03020000 407CE158
00000000 00000000
00020000 407CE158
000000XX 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
*Replace X's with delay between strikes
 
Press Dpad Down to Spawn Lightning
03010000 102F48AA
00000100 00000000
00020000 407CE158
00000002 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE

03010000 102F48AA
000001A0 00000000
12100000 00000100
12100001 00000104
12100002 00000108
00020000 4C000050
00000001 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
03020000 4C000050
00000001 00000000
D1000000 DEADC0DE
03010000 102F48A8
00000002 00000000
30000000 439D89A4
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000140
13100000 00000000
13100001 00000004
13100002 00000008
D0000000 DEADCAFE
ZR+R = Reset first pin location YOU MUST DO THIS ONCE WHEN YOU FIRST TURN ON THE CODE
ZL+L = First Pin
ZL+L+DpadUp = Second Pin
ZL+L+DpadLeft = Third Pin
ZL+L+DpadRight = Fourth Pin
ZL+L+DpadDown = Fifth
R3 = Warp to pin
READ this post for more details https://gbatemp.net/threads/post-your-wiiu-cheat-codes-here.395443/page-336#post-7215289
 
Warp to last Pin Placed
C000000A 60000000
7CE73A78 7D084278
3D004C00 61080204
38E00040 3C604014
60634350 3C80C7C3
60845000 7C633A14
80C30000 7C062000
40A2FFF4 7C671850
90680000 60000000
3C40010F 60426AE0
7C4903A6 4E800420
30000000 4C000204
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE

Rapid Weapon Swinging
30000000 43AD1E30
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000673
03100000 00000000
00000001 00000000
00100000 00000000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
Works best with Spears.
It works by allowing the animation to be cancelled
almost immediately
[0x43AD1E30] + 0x673
 
Always Level 3 Spin Atk.
30000000 43AD1E30
10000000 50000000
31000000 0000067F
00100000 00000002
D0000000 DEADCAFE
Your Spin attacks are always
the strongest version.
Even Quick Spins
 
Instant Urbosa's Fury
30000000 43AD1E30
10000000 50000000
31000000 00000498
00120000 43800000
00120004 43800000
D0000000 DEADCAFE
Urbosa's Fury will be ready as soon as
the spin attack is ready.
Does NOT apply to quick spins sadly

D0000000 DEADCAFE
Its not insanely fast, but its a pretty good improvement
